Content: Hindu priests (Kurukkal) at Alankulam Pullayar Kovil in Thunukkai, Kilinochchi honoured the Army by inviting Major General Kumar Peiris, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division to be one of the distinguished guests for the cornerstone-laying ceremony for a new building at the temple premises on Thursday (5). The head priest has personally extended the invitation as a gesture of goodwill that prevails between the Army and civilians in the area. At the auspicious minute, the GOC also joined the occasion by laying a cornerstone.
